-l|--long.#desc: display extended file metadata as a table

-x|--across.#desc: sort the grid across, rather than downwards

-T|--tree.#desc: recurse into directories as a tree

-F|--classify.#desc: display type indicator by file names

--colo[u]r=WHEN.#desc: when to use terminal colours (always, auto, never)

--colo[u]r-scale.#desc: highlight levels of file sizes distinctly

-d|--list-dirs.#desc: list directories as files; don't list their contents

-I|--ignore-glob.#desc: glob patterns (pipe-separated) of files to ignore

-b|--binary.#desc: list file sizes with binary prefixes

-B|--bytes.#desc: list file sizes in bytes, without any prefixes

-h|--header.#desc: add a header row to each column

-H|--links.#desc: list each file's number of hard links

-n|--numeric.#desc: list numeric user and group IDs

-S|--blocks.#desc: show number of file system blocks

-t|--time.#desc: which timestamp field to list (modified, accessed, created)

--time-style.#desc: how to format timestamps (default, iso, long-iso, full-iso)

--octal-permissions.#desc: list each file's permission in octal format

--git.#desc: list each file's Git status, if tracked or ignored

-@|--extended.#desc: list each file's extended attributes and sizes
